channel.title: Can't load the HD client?
channel.description: Ok well I have downloaded the HD source and client from here. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,327668.0.html I got it all set it up and all that, I can run the source. But, I can't load the client. It loads just until it gets to the part connecting to update server. Can someone help me with that ?

item.title: Can't load the HD client?
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

cause you fail.
you either did the tutorial wrong.
Or you missed a step.

Read full topic

item.title: Can't load the HD client?
item.dc:creator: @Macoronizer Macoronizer
item.description:
@Macoronizer wrote:

Alright, the server is on before I load the client, that’s for sure. So it has to be the cache thing. Can you give me a link to where I can download the cache. Please ?

Read full topic

item.title: Can't load the HD client?
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

You either havn’t downloaded the cache/It’s in the wrong directory, or the server isn’t on before you load the client.

Read full topic

item.title: Can't load the HD client?
item.dc:creator: @Macoronizer Macoronizer
item.description:
@Macoronizer wrote:

Ok well I have downloaded the HD source and client from here. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,327668.0.html
I got it all set it up and all that, I can run the source. But, I can’t load the client. It loads just until it gets to the part connecting to update server. Can someone help me with that ?

Read full topic
